{\footnotesize ℣.} Dignáre: {\footnotesize ℟.} sine peccáto nos custodíre. ^ To keep us without sin.
{\footnotesize ℟.} et clamor meus ad te véniat. ^ and let my cry come unto thee.

O Lord: et omnes insídias inimíci ab ea lónge repélle; ángeli tui sancti hábitent in ea
column7: et benedíctio tua sit super nos semper. ^ Visit
column11: and drive far from it the snares of the enemy; let thy holy angels dwell herein to preserve us in peace
column12: and let thy blessing be always upon us.

nocte ista: qui tecum vivit et regnat in unitáte Spíritus Sancti
O Lord: per ómnia saécula saeculórum. ^ Through Jesus Christ
column7: Who liveth and reigneth with thee
column8: in the unity of the Holy Spirit
